LanguageData.ValueUnchanged: {0} will stay the same. Current value is {1}
LanguageData.ValueUnchangedDefault: {0} defaultValue will stay the same. Current value is {1}
LanguageData.TicksBetweenPatchNotesTooltip: Ticks till the next patch notes will be released. Google the RimWorld time wiki if you're unsure what the values would be. 60,000 ticks = 1 Day
LanguageData.DefsChangedPerPatchTooltip: Number of Defs patched per Patch Notes
LanguageData.FieldsChangedPerDefTooltip: Number of fields patched per Def
LanguageData.PatchNotesStoredTooltip: Max number of patch notes that will be stored and viewable in the Patch Notes window. It will only show the most recent patches up to this amount, but all previous patches will still apply their changes.
LanguageData.DebugShowPatchGenerationTooltip: Output all patch generation steps into Message logs. (For debugging only)
